item.description:
Saturday January 29, 2011 @ Brighton Music Hall
Mean Creek with Taxpayer, Girlfriends, Dirty Dishes
Doors at 8 PM; Show at 9 PM; 18+ show;
Tickets - Advance Price $10

I can't think of a more appropriate choice for our first get-together of the year: four great local bands at Boston's newest (well, sort of) venue. The former Harper's Ferry has just reopened as the Brighton Music Hall with a promising calendar of shows, this among the first. Mean Creek, named "Best Boston Act" in last year's Phoenix Best Music poll, headline a line-up of excellent bands.

We'll meet down the street at Big City around 8 for beers before the show, then likely head over by 9 to catch the first band. Come on out, meet some great people and support local music!  Call/text me on 617-549-8453 when you arrive to find me and the group.
item.how_to_find_us: Call/text me when you arrive to find the group. I'll send out my number a few days before the show.
item.name: Mean Creek w/ Taxpayer, Girlfriends, Dirty Dishes @ Brighton Music Hall
